sub_title: Student at the Hague University  Safety and Security Management
summary:
Hi everyone, I'm Li.  Recently finish my safety and security management bachelor study at the Hague University. I enjoyed my life as an international student in the Netherlands. Being positive, proactive, motivated to perform, detail-focus and creative, I love to step out my comfort zone to know new cultures, people with different backgrounds, and new skills. I'm the first Chinese student in safety and security management bachelor program in the Netherlands. It was a big challenge for me to start a new study in a brand new environment. In the last four years, besides finished all courses in the program, I also learned how to communicate and work with people with various cultural and personality differences. 'Li is a good team player, with good cooperation skills.' This is the comment of my internship tutor, the Administration Manager in the Shanghai Hotel Holland. 

I am not only passionate about traveling but also exploring new lifestyles and cultures. I have been to ten European countries, and I went to North Africa in 2013. During my spare time, I love to be a volunteer.  Since 2009 till now, I am continuing my voluntary work in a Chinese school in the Hague, and in July, 2014, I have been to Lisbon for voluntary work.  I love cook Chinese food and share with friends. Good food and nice conversation can always make my day. Believe in learning at every step of what to seek to accomplish, and having a lot of fun in what you do.

Currently looking for a new starting position where I can fully apply my skills and knowledge. My main fields of interest are Public safety and security management, Risk assessment, Risk control and prevention, Organizational communication and Media and Safety, also open to other opportunities.  I will be available for full-time positions form November 2014 onwards. Please feel free to contact me anytime at xinglili0315@gmail.com; I will respond as fast as I can.

projects.title: Improve the Public safety and Security situation in the Holland Spoor neighbourhood
projects.description: Conduct research in this neighbourhood about its current safety and security situation, focus on one risk or problem in this neighbourhood, and come up with recommendation to prevent this risk or solve this problem with the cooperation of local citizen, government, and police office.

contributors.headline: Student at the Hague University  Safety and Security Management

projects.title: Research about Discrimination of muslim in the Netherlands
projects.description:
Conduct research about the current discrimination of muslim in the Netherlands. Focus on the muslim work field.

Project contained: 

- identify the historical causes, and cases about descrimination of muslim in the Netherlands
- conduct interviews, desk research, about the current situation about descrimination of muslim in the Netherlands
- analyze all findings and sources in culturalistic, human rights, EU law, and International Law perspectives.

contributors.headline: Student at the Hague University  Safety and Security Management

projects.title: Systems of Response - Football Stadium Security Plan
projects.description:
Design an emergency evacuation plan that respond to a possible chaos or violent fights in football studium during FIFA 2012.  

The project contained: 

- Scenario writing, an artificial but realistic Eurocup situational scenario 
- Lessons learned, researching historical stadium incidents 
- Risk Management, analyzing the artificial crisis in the realistic security environment 
- Security response, identifying and cataloguing all of the security measures that are in effect with respect to crowd management and hooliganism in scenario, by using the lessons learned to identify some of the regular security responses.

profile_positions.description: Organize events for Chinese students in the Netherlands. Find sponsors to support those events.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Group Head

profile_positions.description: Design advertisement for the Shanghai Hotel Holland in Chinese Market. Connect Chinese customers and partner travel agencies to expand the hotel business in China. Completed a project about cooperating with Shijiebang, Chinese biggest travelling online company, to set up a partnership and Chinese customers can read the advertisement of Shanghai Hotel Holland online and book the hotel directly on the Chinese website, they can pay the bill in RMB directly.
profile_positions.title: Marketing

profile_positions.description: In the first period, identify risks, evaluate current safety and security management situation in the Shanghai Hotel Holland. In the second period, come up with feasible solutions, based on its financial reality, human resource, and the Dutch Hotel Legal Classification. After getting the agree within the hotel management, implement those solutions in the hotel.
profile_positions.title: Director of Safety and Security

volunteer_experiences.description: Teach foreigners Chinese, and help them to understand Chinese culture. I have been doing this voluntary work since 2009. It is a good chance for me to help those who love Chinese culture and language and during class, I can communicate with people with different backgrounds, such as Korean, Dutch, German, British, and South African.

It is a one-week volunteer work at Portugal CEME church summer camp. Main tasks are arrange activities, design games, and cooperate with other volunteers, from Portugal, Malaysia, Taiwan, Hongkong, mainland China and the Netherlands.
Responsible for organizing weekly gathering and plan activities.
Responsible for preparing food and drinks for weekly gathering, and decorating the lounge.
